Detailed Description

cvmx_srio::_ip_feature

This register is used to override powerup values used by the SRIOMAINT registers and QLM configuration. The register is only reset during COLD boot. It should only be modified only while SRIO()_STATUS_REG[ACCESS] is zero.

This register is reset by the coprocessor-clock cold reset.
